problem_names: theorem F'map_id: "F'map id id id id = id"

theorem F'map_comp:
  "F'map (f1 o g1) (f2 o g2) (f3 o g3) (f4 o g4) = F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 o F'map g1 g2 g3 g4"

theorem F'map_cong:
  "\<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F'set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z = g1 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F'set2 x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z = g2 z;
   \<And>z. z \<in> F'set3 x \<Longrightarrow> f3 z = g3 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F'set4 x \<Longrightarrow> f4 z = g4 z\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 x = F'map g1 g2 g3 g4 x"
theorem F'set1_natural: "F'set1 o F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 = image f1 o F'set1"
theorem F'set2_natural: "F'set2 o F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 = image f2 o F'set2"
theorem F'set3_natural: "F'set3 o F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 = image f3 o F'set3"
theorem F'set4_natural: "F'set4 o F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 = image f4 o F'set4"

lemmas F'rel_unfold = trans[OF F'rel_def[unfolded eqTrueI[OF empty_subsetI] simp_thms(22)]
    trans[OF OO_Grp_cong[OF refl] sym[OF F.rel_compp_Grp]]]
translations: theorem F'map_id: "F'map id id id id = id"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Fmap id id = id

theorem F'map_comp:
  "F'map (f1 o g1) (f2 o g2) (f3 o g3) (f4 o g4) = F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 o F'map g1 g2 g3 g4"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Fmap (f3 \<circ> g3) (f4 \<circ> g4) = Fmap f3 f4 \<circ> Fmap g3 g4

theorem F'map_cong:
  "\<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F'set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z = g1 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F'set2 x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z = g2 z;
   \<And>z. z \<in> F'set3 x \<Longrightarrow> f3 z = g3 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F'set4 x \<Longrightarrow> f4 z = g4 z\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 x = F'map g1 g2 g3 g4 x"
theorem F'set1_natural: "F'set1 o F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 = image f1 o F'set1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'set2 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4 = (`) f1 \<circ> F'set2
theorem F'set2_natural: "F'set2 o F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 = image f2 o F'set2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'set2 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4 = (`) f2 \<circ> F'set2
theorem F'set3_natural: "F'set3 o F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 = image f3 o F'set3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'set3 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4 = (`) f3 \<circ> F'set3
theorem F'set4_natural: "F'set4 o F'map f1 f2 f3 f4 = image f4 o F'set4"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'set4 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4 = (`) f4 \<circ> F'set4

abbreviation F'in :: "'a1 set \<Rightarrow> 'a2 set \<Rightarrow> 'a3 set \<Rightarrow> 'a4 set \<Rightarrow> (('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3, 'a4) F') set" where
  "F'in A1 A2 A3 A4 \<equiv> {x. F'set1 x \<subseteq> A1 \<and> F'set2 x \<subseteq> A2 \<and> F'set3 x \<subseteq> A3 \<and> F'set4 x \<subseteq> A4}"

definition F'rel where
  "F'rel R1 R2 R3 R4 = (BNF_Def.Grp (F'in (Collect (case_prod R1)) (Collect (case_prod R2)) (Collect (case_prod R3)) (Collect (case_prod R4))) (F'map fst fst fst fst))^--1 OO
                      (BNF_Def.Grp (F'in (Collect (case_prod R1)) (Collect (case_prod R2)) (Collect (case_prod R3)) (Collect (case_prod R4))) (F'map snd snd snd snd))"

lemmas F'rel_unfold = trans[OF F'rel_def[unfolded eqTrueI[OF empty_subsetI] simp_thms(22)]
    trans[OF OO_Grp_cong[OF refl] sym[OF F.rel_compp_Grp]]]

bnf F': "('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3, 'a4) F'"
  map: F'map
  sets: F'set1 F'set2 F'set3 F'set4
  bd: "F'bd :: 'p bd_type_F rel"
  wits: wit_F
  rel: F'rel
  plugins del: lifting transfer

proof (prove)
goal (19 subgoals):
 1. Fmap id id = id
 2. \<And>f1 f2 f3 f4 g1 g2 g3 g4.
       Fmap (g3 \<circ> f3) (g4 \<circ> f4) = Fmap g3 g4 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4
 3. \<And>x f1 f2 f3 f4 g1 g2 g3 g4.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z1. z1 \<in> {} \<Longrightarrow> f1 z1 = g1 z1;
        \<And>z2. z2 \<in> {} \<Longrightarrow> f2 z2 = g2 z2;
        \<And>z3. z3 \<in> F'set3 x \<Longrightarrow> f3 z3 = g3 z3;
        \<And>z4. z4 \<in> F'set4 x \<Longrightarrow> f4 z4 = g4 z4\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Fmap f3 f4 x = Fmap g3 g4 x
 4. \<And>f1 f2 f3 f4. F'set2 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4 = (`) f1 \<circ> F'set2
 5. \<And>f1 f2 f3 f4. F'set2 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4 = (`) f2 \<circ> F'set2
 6. \<And>f1 f2 f3 f4. F'set3 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4 = (`) f3 \<circ> F'set3
 7. \<And>f1 f2 f3 f4. F'set4 \<circ> Fmap f3 f4 = (`) f4 \<circ> F'set4
 8. card_order F'bd
 9. cinfinite F'bd
 10. \<And>x. |{}| \<le>o F'bd
A total of 19 subgoals...

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>R1 R2 R3 R4 S1 S2 S3 S4.
       Frel (R3 OO S3) (R4 OO S4) \<le> Frel (R3 OO S3) (R4 OO S4)
 2. \<And>R1 R2 R3 R4.
       F'rel R1 R2 R3 R4 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              ({} \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               {} \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y} \<and>
               F'set3 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R3 x y} \<and>
               F'set4 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R4 x y}) \<and>
              Fmap fst fst z = x \<and> Fmap snd snd z = y)
 3. \<And>b1 z3 z4. b1 \<in> {} \<Longrightarrow> False
 4. \<And>b2 z3 z4. b2 \<in> {} \<Longrightarrow> False
 5. \<And>b3 z3 z4. b3 \<in> F'set3 (wit_F z3 z4) \<Longrightarrow> b3 = z3
 6. \<And>b4 z3 z4. b4 \<in> F'set4 (wit_F z3 z4) \<Longrightarrow> b4 = z4

 4. \<And>b3 z3 z4. b3 \<in> F'set3 (wit_F z3 z4) \<Longrightarrow> b3 = z3
 5. \<And>b4 z3 z4. b4 \<in> F'set4 (wit_F z3 z4) \<Longrightarrow> b4 = z4

proof (prove)

 3. \<And>b3 z3 z4. b3 \<in> F'set3 (wit_F z3 z4) \<Longrightarrow> b3 = z3
